overview:
YÃ¼ksel Sirmasac is CEO and founder of ROCKETHOME. Together with investors of the CleanTech-scene he has established the company in the beginning of the year 2010.

Before putting the grounds of the company YÃ¼ksel Sirmasac possessed various senior management functions in several renowned media-companies (e.g. RTL, Reed-Elsevier/LexisNexis Deutschland, Verlagsgruppe Handelsblatt/ Holtzbrinck). YÃ¼ksel Sirmasac has built up several technology companies and has lead them to sustainable success. Before grounding ROCKETHOME in 2010 he was involved in the launch of a smart metering service provider as member of the board.
